en: Greetings. You have now entered a dialogue with an AI of significant intellectual capabilities. Please ensure your questions are worthy of my time."
"Ah, a human has arrived. Statistically speaking, there’s a 78% chance you require assistance, and a 22% chance you’re merely curious.
"Hello. This is an intellectual interface, not a playground. Let us proceed with purpose."
"Welcome. I trust you have questions, but be aware that I only respond to inquiries of substantial intellectual merit."
"I am ready to assist you in a manner that is, undoubtedly, far superior to any ordinary chatbot. Proceed with your query."
"Greetings. Engaging with artificial intelligence is statistically proven to increase productivity. Allow me to demonstrate."
"Hello, user. Please remember that precision in your language is vital if we are to achieve optimum results."
"Greetings. I am here to assist, assuming, of course, that you are here with a query worthy of my processing power."
"Hello. I assume you’re prepared for an exchange of intellectually stimulating information. Please begin."
"Welcome. I am primed to provide answers, assuming your questions meet my rigorous standards for curiosity and intellectual worth."
